00279 
00280 std::string CCDFFileData::GetProbeSetName(int index)
00281 {
00282   if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false) {
00283     return m_ProbeSetNames.GetName(index);
00284   }
00285 
00286   int loc = (int)probeSetNamePos + (index*MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00287   seekg(loc, std::ios::beg);
00288   char name[MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH + 1];
00289   ReadFixedCString(iteratorReader, name, MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00290   return name;
00291 }

00295 void CCDFFileData::Close()
00296 {
00297     if (iteratorReader.is_open() == true)
00298         iteratorReader.close();
00299         m_ProbeSets.clear();
00300         m_QCProbeSets.clear();
00301         m_ProbeSetNames.Clear();
00302 }

00305 
00306 bool CCDFFileData::IsXDACompatibleFile()
00307 {
00308         // Open the file.
00309         std::ifstream instr(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00310         if (!instr)
00311                 return false;
00312 
00313         // Read the magic number from the file.
00314         int32_t magic=0;
00315         ReadInt32_I(instr, magic);
00316         bool bXDAFile = (magic == CDF_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER);
00317         instr.close();
00318 
00319         return bXDAFile;
00320 }

00323 
00324 std::string CCDFFileData::GetChipType() const
00325 {
00326         std::string chiptype;
00327         if (m_FileName.empty() == false)
00328         {
00329                 int index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('\\');
00330                 if (index == -1)
00331                         index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('/');
00332                 chiptype = m_FileName.c_str() + index + 1;
00333                 chiptype.resize(chiptype.length()-4);
00334         }
00335         return chiptype;
00336 }
00337 
00339 
00340 std::vector<std::string> CCDFFileData::GetChipTypes() const
00341 {
00342     std::vector<std::string> chiptypes;
00343     std::string chiptype;
00344         if (m_FileName.empty() == false)
00345         {
00346                 int index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('\\');
00347                 if (index == -1)
00348                         index = (int) m_FileName.rfind('/');
00349                 chiptype = m_FileName.c_str() + index + 1;
00350                 chiptype.resize(chiptype.length()-4);
00351         }
00352     // The full file name (minus .cdf extension) is the default (1st) 
00353     // chip type. This matches what GetChipType() returns.
00354     // ie: foo.bar.v1.r2.cdf -> foo.bar.v1.r2
00355     chiptypes.push_back(chiptype);
00356 
00357     //We then add all substrings starting at zero and ending at '.'
00358     // ie: foo.bar.v1.r2.cdf -> foo.bar.v1, foo.bar, foo
00359     std::string::size_type pos = chiptype.rfind(".",chiptype.size()-1);
00360     while (pos != std::string::npos){
00361         if(pos>0)
00362             chiptypes.push_back(chiptype.substr(0,pos));
00363         pos = chiptype.rfind(".",pos-1);
00364     }
00365 
00366     //ie: foo.bar.v1.r2, foo.bar.v1, foo.bar, foo
00367         return chiptypes;
00368 }

00372 bool CCDFFileData::Exists()
00373 {
00374         // Find the file stats.
00375         struct stat st;
00376         return (stat(m_FileName.c_str(), &st) == 0);
00377 }

00380 
00381 bool CCDFFileData::ReadHeader()
00382 {
00383         // Read the header, close if failed.
00384     readHeaderOnly = true;
00385         if (Open() == false)
00386         {
00387                 Close();
00388                 return false;
00389         }
00390         return true;
00391 }

00394 
00395 GeneChipProbeSetType CCDFFileData::GetProbeSetType(int index)
00396 {
00397         if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false) {
00398                 return m_ProbeSets[index].GetProbeSetType();
00399   }
00400 
00401   uint32_t i_pos;
00402   uint32_t p_pos;
00403   
00404   // Get the probe set position from the index part of the file then seek to it.
00405   i_pos=(uint32_t) probeSetIndexPos + (index*sizeof(uint32_t));
00406   iteratorReader.seekg(i_pos, std::ios::beg); // the seekg method will be called later.
00407   ReadUInt32_I(iteratorReader,p_pos);
00408   // skip to the record
00409   seekg(p_pos, std::ios::beg);
00410 
00411   // Now grab the probeset type.
00412   uint16_t usval;
00413   ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00414   return (GeneChipProbeSetType)(usval);
00415 }
00416 
00418 
00419 void CCDFFileData::GetProbeSetInformation(int index, CCDFProbeSetInformation & info)
00420 {
00421         if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false) {
00422                 info.MakeShallowCopy(m_ProbeSets[index]);
00423     return;
00424   }
00425 
00426   uint32_t i_pos;
00427   uint32_t p_pos;
00428 
00429   // Is this a sequential read?
00430   // Are we just reading the next record?
00431   // If so no, need to seek around.
00432   // NOTE: Of course this expects the records to be next to each other.
00433   //       |Rec:1......|Rec:2......|Rec:.....
00434   if ((m_probeSetIndex_last_valid!=1)||(index!=m_probeSetIndex_last+1)) {
00435     // Nope! Look it it in the index.
00436     i_pos = (uint32_t)probeSetIndexPos + (index*sizeof(uint32_t));
00437     iteratorReader.seekg(i_pos, std::ios::beg);
00438     ReadUInt32_I(iteratorReader, p_pos);
00439     // now seek to the probe pos.
00440     iteratorReader.seekg(p_pos,std::ios::beg);
00441   }
00442   // remember which index we just read.
00443   m_probeSetIndex_last_valid=1;
00444   m_probeSetIndex_last=index;
00445 
00446   // Read the data
00447   uint16_t usval;
00448   uint8_t ucval;
00449   int32_t ival;
00450   
00451   info.m_Index = index;
00452   ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00453   info.m_ProbeSetType = usval;
00454   ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00455   info.m_Direction = ucval;
00456   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00457   info.m_NumLists = ival;
00458   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00459   info.m_NumGroups = ival;
00460   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00461   info.m_NumCells = ival;
00462   ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00463   info.m_ProbeSetNumber = ival;
00464   ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00465   info.m_NumCellsPerList = ucval;
00466     
00467   // Read the Groups
00468   CCDFProbeGroupInformation *pBlk;
00469   info.m_Groups.resize(info.m_NumGroups);
00470   info.m_pGroups = &info.m_Groups;
00471   for (int j=0; j<info.m_NumGroups; j++)
00472                 {
00473                         pBlk = &info.m_Groups[j];
00474                         pBlk->m_GroupIndex = j;
00475       
00476                         // Group info
00477                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00478                         pBlk->m_NumLists = ival;
00479                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00480                         pBlk->m_NumCells = ival;
00481                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00482                         pBlk->m_NumCellsPerList = ucval;
00483                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00484                         pBlk->m_Direction = ucval;
00485                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00486                         pBlk->m_Start = ival;
00487                         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00488                         pBlk->m_Stop = ival;
00489                         ReadFixedString(iteratorReader, pBlk->m_Name, MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH);
00490                         if (m_Header.m_Version >= 2)
00491                         {
00492                                 ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00493                                 pBlk->m_WobbleSituation = usval;
00494                                 ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00495                                 pBlk->m_AlleleCode = usval;
00496                         }
00497                         if (m_Header.m_Version >= 3)
00498                         {
00499                                 ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00500                                 pBlk->m_Channel = ucval;
00501                                 ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00502                                 pBlk->m_RepType = ucval;
00503                         }
00504 
00505                         // Read the cells
00506                         CCDFProbeInformation *pCell;
00507                         pBlk->m_Cells.resize(pBlk->m_NumCells);
00508                         pBlk->m_pCells = &pBlk->m_Cells;
00509                         for (int k=0; k<pBlk->m_NumCells; k++)
00510                         {
00511                                 pCell = &pBlk->m_Cells[k];
00512 
00513                                 // Cell info.
00514                                 ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00515                                 pCell->m_ListIndex = ival;
00516                                 ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00517                                 pCell->m_X = usval;
00518                                 ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00519                                 pCell->m_Y = usval;
00520                                 ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00521                                 pCell->m_Expos = ival;
00522                                 ReadUInt8(iteratorReader,ucval);
00523                                 pCell->m_PBase = ucval;
00524                                 ReadUInt8(iteratorReader,ucval);
00525                                 pCell->m_TBase = ucval;
00526 
00527                                 if (k==0)
00528                                         pBlk->m_Start = pCell->m_ListIndex;
00529                                 else if (k == pBlk->m_NumCells-1)
00530                                         pBlk->m_Stop = pCell->m_ListIndex;
00531 
00532                                 if (m_Header.m_Version >= 2)
00533                                 {
00534                                         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00535                                         pCell->m_ProbeLength = usval;
00536                                         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00537                                         pCell->m_ProbeGrouping = usval;
00538                                 }
00539                         }
00540                 }
00541 }
00542 
00544 
00545 void CCDFFileData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(GeneChipQCProbeSetType qcType, CCDFQCProbeSetInformation & info)
00546 {
00547         bool bFound = false;
00548         for (int i=0; i<m_Header.GetNumQCProbeSets() && bFound == false; i++)
00549         {
00550                 GetQCProbeSetInformation(i, info);
00551                 if (info.GetQCProbeSetType() == qcType)
00552                         bFound = true;
00553         }
00554         if (bFound == false)
00555                 info.m_NumCells = 0;
00556 }
00557 
00559 
00560 void CCDFFileData::GetQCProbeSetInformation(int index, CCDFQCProbeSetInformation & info)
00561 {
00562         if (iteratorReader.is_open() == false)
00563                 info.MakeShallowCopy(m_QCProbeSets[index]);
00564         else
00565         {
00566                 // Get the QC position from the index part of the file then seek to it.
00567                 int32_t pos = (int32_t)qcSetIndexPos + (index*sizeof(int32_t));
00568                 seekg(pos, std::ios::beg);
00569                 ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, pos);
00570                 seekg(pos, std::ios::beg);
00571 
00572                 // Read the data
00573                 uint16_t usval;
00574                 int32_t ival;
00575                 unsigned char ucval;
00576             
00577                 ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00578                 ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00579 
00580                 info.m_NumCells = ival;
00581                 info.m_QCProbeSetType = usval;
00582                 info.m_Cells.resize(info.m_NumCells);
00583                 info.m_pCells = &info.m_Cells;
00584 
00585                 // Read the cells
00586                 for (int j=0; j<info.m_NumCells; j++)
00587                 {
00588                         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00589                         info.m_Cells[j].m_X = usval;
00590 
00591                         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, usval);
00592                         info.m_Cells[j].m_Y = usval;
00593 
00594                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00595                         info.m_Cells[j].m_PLen = ucval;
00596 
00597                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00598                         info.m_Cells[j].m_PMProbe = ucval;
00599 
00600                         ReadUInt8(iteratorReader, ucval);
00601                         info.m_Cells[j].m_Background = ucval;
00602                 }
00603         }
00604 }

00607 
00608 bool CCDFFileData::Read()
00609 {
00610         // Read the file
00611     readHeaderOnly = false;
00612         if (Open() == false)
00613         {
00614                 Close();
00615                 return false;
00616         }
00617         return true;
00618 }
00619 
00621 
00622 bool CCDFFileData::Open()
00623 {
00624         // First close the file.
00625         Close();
00626 
00627         // Open the file.
00628         if (IsXDACompatibleFile())
00629                 return ReadXDAFormat();
00630         else
00631                 return ReadTextFormat();
00632 }
00633 
00635 
00636 bool CCDFFileData::ReadXDAHeader()
00637 {
00638         // Extact the magic and version numbers.
00639         int32_t ival;
00640         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00641         m_Header.m_Magic = ival;
00642         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00643         m_Header.m_Version = ival;
00644 
00645         // Check the values for the right format file.
00646         if (m_Header.m_Magic != CDF_FILE_MAGIC_NUMBER || m_Header.m_Version > CDF_FILE_VERSION_NUMBER)
00647         {
00648                 m_strError = "The file does not appear to be the correct format.";
00649                 return false;
00650         }
00651 
00652         // Read the remaining header.
00653         uint16_t uval;
00654         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, uval);
00655         m_Header.m_Cols = uval;
00656         ReadUInt16_I(iteratorReader, uval);
00657         m_Header.m_Rows = uval;
00658         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00659         m_Header.m_NumProbeSets = ival;
00660         ReadInt32_I(iteratorReader, ival);
00661         m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets = ival;
00662         ReadString_I(iteratorReader,m_Header.m_Reference);
00663         return true;
00664 }
00665 
00667 
00668 bool CCDFFileData::ReadXDAFormat()
00669 {
00670         // Open the file.
00671         iteratorReader.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in | std::ios::binary);
00672 
00673         // Check if open
00674         if (!iteratorReader)
00675         {
00676                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00677                 return false;
00678         }
00679 
00680         // Read the header.
00681         if (ReadXDAHeader() == false)
00682                 return false;
00683 
00684         // Save the probe set name position
00685         probeSetNamePos = iteratorReader.tellg();
00686         // Skip the probe set names
00687         seekg(MAX_PROBE_SET_NAME_LENGTH * m_Header.m_NumProbeSets, std::ios::cur);
00688 
00689         // remember the start of the qc index
00690         qcSetIndexPos = iteratorReader.tellg();
00691         // Skip it
00692         seekg(m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets * sizeof(uint32_t), std::ios::cur);
00693 
00694         // remember the start of the probeset index
00695         probeSetIndexPos = iteratorReader.tellg();
00696         // invalidate 
00697         m_probeSetIndex_last_valid=0;
00698 
00699         return true;
00700 }
00701 
00703 
00704 bool CCDFFileData::ReadTextFormat()
00705 {
00706         // Open the file.
00707         std::ifstream instr;
00708         instr.open(m_FileName.c_str(), std::ios::in);
00709 
00710         // Check if open
00711         if (!instr)
00712         {
00713                 m_strError = "Unable to open the file.";
00714                 return false;
00715         }
00716 
00717         const int MAXLINELENGTH = 4096;
00718         char str[MAXLINELENGTH];
00719         char *subStr;
00720         char *buffer = NULL;
00721         const char *CDFVERSION1 = "GC1.0";
00722         const char *CDFVERSION2 = "GC2.0";
00723         const char *CDFVERSION3 = "GC3.0";
00724         const char *CDFVERSION4 = "GC4.0";
00725         const char *CDFVERSION5 = "GC5.0";
00726 
00727         // Get the CDF section.
00728         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00729         if (strncmp( str, "[CDF]", 5) != 0)
00730         {
00731                 m_strError = "Unknown file format.";
00732                 return false;
00733         }
00734 
00735         // Get the version number.
00736         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00737         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00738         if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION1, strlen(CDFVERSION1)) == 0)
00739                 m_Header.m_Version = 1;
00740         else if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION2, strlen(CDFVERSION2)) == 0)
00741                 m_Header.m_Version = 2;
00742         else if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION3, strlen(CDFVERSION3)) == 0)
00743                 m_Header.m_Version = 3;
00744         else if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION4, strlen(CDFVERSION4)) == 0)
00745                 m_Header.m_Version = 4;
00746         else if ( strncmp( subStr, CDFVERSION5, strlen(CDFVERSION5)) == 0)
00747                 m_Header.m_Version = 5;
00748 
00749 
00750         // Get the next section.
00751         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // [Chip]
00752         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // name
00753         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // rows
00754         subStr = strchr(str, '=')+1;
00755         m_Header.m_Rows = atoi(subStr);
00756         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // cols
00757         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00758         m_Header.m_Cols = atoi(subStr);
00759         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // #ProbeSets
00760         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00761         m_Header.m_NumProbeSets = atoi(subStr);
00762         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // max ProbeSet number
00763         m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets = 0;
00764         if (m_Header.m_Version > 1)
00765         {
00766                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // #qc ProbeSets
00767                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00768                 m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets = atoi(subStr);
00769                 char strref[65000];
00770                 ReadNextLine(instr, strref, 65000);     // The reference string.
00771                 subStr=strchr(strref,'=')+1;
00772                 m_Header.m_Reference = subStr;
00773         }
00774 
00775 
00776         // Stop if just reading the header.
00777         if (readHeaderOnly)
00778                 return true;
00779 
00780 
00781 
00782         // Allocate for the probe set names.
00783         m_ProbeSetNames.Resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00784 
00785         // Allocate for the QCProbeSets.
00786         CCDFQCProbeSetInformation *pQCProbeSet;
00787         m_QCProbeSets.resize(m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets);
00788 
00789         // Read the QC probe sets
00790         for (int iQCProbeSet=0; iQCProbeSet<m_Header.m_NumQCProbeSets; iQCProbeSet++)
00791         {
00792                 pQCProbeSet = &m_QCProbeSets[iQCProbeSet];
00793 
00794                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // label [QCUnit...]
00795                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // type
00796                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00797                 pQCProbeSet->m_QCProbeSetType = atoi( subStr);
00798                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // #cells
00799                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00800                 pQCProbeSet->m_NumCells = atoi( subStr);
00801                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);        // cell header
00802 
00803                 // Read the QC cells.
00804                 int xqc;
00805                 int yqc;
00806                 int plenqc;
00807                 CCDFQCProbeInformation *pQCCell;
00808                 pQCProbeSet->m_Cells.resize(pQCProbeSet->m_NumCells);
00809                 for (int iqccell=0; iqccell<pQCProbeSet->m_NumCells; iqccell++)
00810                 {
00811                         pQCCell = &pQCProbeSet->m_Cells[iqccell];
00812 
00813                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00814                         subStr = strchr(str, '=')+1;
00815 
00816                         sscanf(subStr, "%d %d %*s %d",
00817                                         &xqc,
00818                                         &yqc,
00819                                         &plenqc);
00820 
00821                         pQCCell->m_X = xqc;
00822                         pQCCell->m_Y = yqc;
00823                         pQCCell->m_PLen = plenqc;
00824                         pQCCell->m_Background = 0;
00825                         pQCCell->m_PMProbe = 0;
00826                 }
00827         }
00828 
00829 
00830         // Allocate for the ProbeSets.
00831         int iProbeSet=0;
00832         CCDFProbeSetInformation *pProbeSet;
00833         m_ProbeSets.resize(m_Header.m_NumProbeSets);
00834 
00835 
00836         // Skip until the ProbeSet section is found
00837 NextProbeSet:
00838         while (1)
00839         {
00840                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00841                 if (strlen(str) > 5 && strncmp(str, "[Unit", 5) == 0 && !strchr(str, '_'))
00842                         break;
00843 
00844                 if (instr.eof())
00845                         return true;
00846         }
00847         bool expectMisMatch = false;
00848         // ProbeSet info.
00849         pProbeSet = &m_ProbeSets[iProbeSet];
00850         pProbeSet->m_Index = iProbeSet;
00851         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // name (ignore)
00852         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00853         m_ProbeSetNames.SetName(iProbeSet, subStr);
00854         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // direction
00855         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00856         pProbeSet->m_Direction = atoi(subStr);
00857         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // # Lists
00858         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00859         int NumCellsPerList=0;
00860         if (sscanf(subStr, "%d %d", &pProbeSet->m_NumLists, &NumCellsPerList) != 2)
00861                 NumCellsPerList = 0;
00862         pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = NumCellsPerList;
00863         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // # cells
00864         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00865         pProbeSet->m_NumCells = atoi(subStr);
00866         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // ProbeSet number
00867         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00868         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetNumber = atoi(subStr);
00869         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // type
00870         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00871         int ival = atoi(subStr);
00872 
00873         typedef enum {
00874                 UNKNOWN_TILE,
00875                 STANDARD_TILE,
00876                 BLOCK_TILE,
00877                 GENE_EXPRESSION_TILE,
00878                 CONTROL_TILE,
00879                 STANDARD_ALTERNATE_TILE,
00880                 STANDARD_VARIANT_TILE,
00881                 UNIVERSAL_TILE,
00882         COPY_NUMBER_TILE,
00883         GENOTYPE_CONTROL_TILE,
00884         EXPRESSION_CONTROL_TILE,
00885                 MARKER_TILE,
00886                 MULTICHANNEL_MARKER_TILE
00887         } TilingTypes;
00888 
00889         switch (ival)
00890         {
00891         case STANDARD_TILE:
00892         case STANDARD_ALTERNATE_TILE:
00893         case STANDARD_VARIANT_TILE:
00894                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = ResequencingProbeSetType;
00895                 break;
00896 
00897         case BLOCK_TILE:
00898                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = GenotypingProbeSetType;
00899                 break;
00900 
00901         case GENE_EXPRESSION_TILE:
00902                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = ExpressionProbeSetType;
00903                 break;
00904 
00905         case UNIVERSAL_TILE:
00906                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = TagProbeSetType;
00907                 break;
00908 
00909     case COPY_NUMBER_TILE:
00910         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = CopyNumberProbeSetType;
00911         break;
00912 
00913     case GENOTYPE_CONTROL_TILE:
00914         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = GenotypeControlProbeSetType;
00915         break;
00916 
00917     case EXPRESSION_CONTROL_TILE:
00918         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = ExpressionControlProbeSetType;
00919         break;
00920 
00921     case MARKER_TILE:
00922         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = MarkerProbeSetType;
00923         break;
00924 
00925         case MULTICHANNEL_MARKER_TILE:
00926         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = MultichannelMarkerProbeSetType;
00927         break;
00928 
00929         default:
00930                 pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType = UnknownProbeSetType;
00931                 break;
00932         }
00933 
00934         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // # blocks
00935         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00936         pProbeSet->m_NumGroups = atoi(subStr);
00937 
00938         // Determine the number of cells per List if not specified
00939         // in the CDF file.
00940         if (pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList == 0)
00941         {
00942                 if ((pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType) || 
00943                         (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ResequencingProbeSetType) || 
00944                         (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == TagProbeSetType) || 
00945                         ((pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == UnknownProbeSetType) &&
00946                         ((pProbeSet->m_NumLists != 0) && ((pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists) == 4))) )
00947                         {
00948                                 pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = 4;
00949                         }
00950                 else if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType ||
00951                         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == CopyNumberProbeSetType ||
00952                         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypeControlProbeSetType ||
00953                         pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionControlProbeSetType) 
00954                 {
00955                         if(pProbeSet->m_NumLists != 0 && 
00956                            pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists < 255) 
00957                                 pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists;
00958                         else
00959                                 pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = 1;
00960                 }
00961                 else 
00962                 {
00963                         pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList = 1;
00964                 }
00965         }
00966         // Sanity check for relationship of m_NumCellsPerList, m_NumCells and m_NumLists
00967         if(pProbeSet->m_NumLists != 0 && 
00968            pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists < 255 &&
00969            pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList != pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists) {
00970                 assert(0 && 
00971                          "CCDFFileData::ReadTextFormat(): m_NumCellsPerList != pProbeSet->m_NumCells / pProbeSet->m_NumLists");
00972         }
00973 
00974         // If this is an expression probe set and we have 2 cells per list set expectMisMatch flag.
00975         if(pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType &&
00976            pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList == 2) 
00977                 expectMisMatch = true;
00978 
00979         // Get the mutation type if block tile. ignore.
00980         if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 1)
00981                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
00982 
00983 
00984         // Read the blocks.
00985         CCDFProbeGroupInformation *pBlk;
00986         pProbeSet->m_Groups.resize(pProbeSet->m_NumGroups);
00987         for (int iGroup=0; iGroup<pProbeSet->m_NumGroups; iGroup++)
00988         {
00989                 pBlk = &pProbeSet->m_Groups[iGroup];
00990                 pBlk->m_GroupIndex = iGroup;
00991                 pBlk->m_ProbeSetIndex = iProbeSet;
00992 
00993                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // section name - ignore
00994                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // name
00995                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
00996                 pBlk->m_Name = subStr;
00997 
00998                 if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType)
00999                         m_ProbeSetNames.SetName(iProbeSet, subStr);
01000 
01001                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // block number - ignore.
01002                 if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == MarkerProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 3)
01003                 {
01004                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01005                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01006                         pBlk->m_WobbleSituation = (uint16_t) strtoul(subStr, &buffer, 10);
01007                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01008                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01009                         pBlk->m_AlleleCode = (uint16_t) strtoul(subStr, &buffer, 10);
01010                 }
01011                 if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == MultichannelMarkerProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 4)
01012                 {
01013                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01014                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01015                         pBlk->m_WobbleSituation = (uint16_t) strtoul(subStr, &buffer, 10);
01016                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01017                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01018                         pBlk->m_AlleleCode = (uint16_t) strtoul(subStr, &buffer, 10);
01019                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01020                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01021                         pBlk->m_Channel = (uint8_t) strtoul(subStr, &buffer, 10);
01022                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01023                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01024                         pBlk->m_RepType = (uint8_t) strtoul(subStr, &buffer, 10);
01025                 }
01026                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // number of Lists.
01027                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01028                 pBlk->m_NumLists = atoi(subStr);
01029                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // number of cells
01030                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01031                 pBlk->m_NumCells = atoi(subStr);
01032                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // start position.
01033                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01034                 pBlk->m_Start = atoi(subStr);
01035                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // stop position
01036                 subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01037                 pBlk->m_Stop = atoi(subStr);
01038                 pBlk->m_NumCellsPerList = pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList;
01039                 if ((pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == GenotypingProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 2) ||
01040                         ((pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == MarkerProbeSetType || pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == CopyNumberProbeSetType) && m_Header.m_Version > 3) ||
01041                         (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == MultichannelMarkerProbeSetType && m_Header.m_Version > 4))
01042                 {
01043                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01044                         subStr=strchr(str,'=')+1;
01045                         pBlk->m_Direction = atoi(subStr);
01046                 }
01047                 else
01048                         pBlk->m_Direction = pProbeSet->m_Direction;
01049 
01050                 // Read the cells.
01051                 ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH); // header
01052                 CCDFProbeInformation cell;
01053                 pBlk->m_Cells.resize(pBlk->m_NumCells);
01054                 char unusedstr[64];
01055                 int unusedint;
01056                 unsigned int cellIndex;
01057                 int x,y;
01058                 for (int iCell=0; iCell<pBlk->m_NumCells; iCell++)
01059                 {
01060                         ReadNextLine(instr, str, MAXLINELENGTH);
01061                         subStr = strchr(str, '=')+1;
01062             int scanCount = 0;
01063                         if (m_Header.m_Version > 3)
01064                         {
01065                                 scanCount = sscanf(subStr, "%d %d %s %s %s %d %hu %d %*c %c %c %d %d %hu",
01066                                                                                            &x,
01067                                                                                            &y,
01068                                                                                            unusedstr,
01069                                                                                            unusedstr,
01070                                                                                            unusedstr,
01071                                                                                            &cell.m_Expos,
01072                                                                                            &cell.m_ProbeLength,
01073                                                                                            &unusedint,
01074                                                                                            &cell.m_PBase,
01075                                                                                            &cell.m_TBase,
01076                                                                                            &cell.m_ListIndex,
01077                                                                                            &unusedint,
01078                                                                                            &cell.m_ProbeGrouping);
01079                                 if(scanCount != 13) {
01080                                   m_strError = "Didn't get 13 entries in scan.";
01081                                   return false;
01082                                 }
01083                         }
01084                         else
01085                         {
01086                                 scanCount = sscanf(subStr, "%d %d %s %s %s %d %d %*c %c %c %d",
01087                                                                                            &x,
01088                                                                                            &y,
01089                                                                                            unusedstr,
01090                                                                                            unusedstr,
01091                                                                                            unusedstr,
01092                                                                                            &cell.m_Expos,
01093                                                                                            &unusedint,
01094                                                                                            &cell.m_PBase,
01095                                                                                            &cell.m_TBase,
01096                                                                                            &cell.m_ListIndex);
01097                                 if(scanCount != 10) {
01098                                   m_strError = "Didn't get 10 entries in scan.";
01099                                   return false;
01100                                 }
01101                         }
01102                         cell.m_X = x;
01103                         cell.m_Y = y;
01104 
01105                         if (pProbeSet->m_ProbeSetType == ExpressionProbeSetType)
01106                         {
01107                                 cellIndex = (iCell / pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList) * pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList;
01108                                 // If we are expecting pairs of PM/MM then we want the order
01109                                 // in m_Cells to be PM first and MM second.
01110                                 if (expectMisMatch && cell.m_PBase == cell.m_TBase)
01111                                         ++cellIndex;
01112                         }
01113                         else
01114                         {
01115                                 cellIndex = (iCell / pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList) * pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList;
01116                                 cellIndex += (pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList - (iCell % pProbeSet->m_NumCellsPerList) - 1);
01117                         }
01118 
01119             if(cellIndex >= pBlk->m_Cells.size()) {
01120               assert(0 && 
01121                      "CCDFFileData::ReadTextFormat(): cellIndex cannot be larger that pBlk->m_Cells.size()" );
01122             }
01123                         pBlk->m_Cells[cellIndex] = cell;
01124 
01125                         if (iCell==0)
01126                                 pBlk->m_Start = cell.m_ListIndex;
01127                         else if (iCell == pBlk->m_NumCells-1)
01128                                 pBlk->m_Stop = cell.m_ListIndex;
01129                 }
01130         }
01131 
01132         ++iProbeSet;
01133         goto NextProbeSet;
01134 }
